summary: This document is a summary of account balances and transactions for a Deutsche Bank account associated with Zorro Development Corp. It details the account's beginning and ending balances for February 2015, along with specific transactions including deposits, checks paid, and service charges.

persons.name: Amanda Kirby
persons.context: Amanda Kirby is mentioned as a contact for personal assistance regarding the account.

events.title: Account Summary for February 2015
events.description: The document summarizes the account balance and transactions for Zorro Development Corp. for the month of February 2015.

locations: 6100 Red Hook Quarter, St. Thomas, U.S. Virgin Islands
keyFacts: The account balance at the beginning of February 2015 was $540,938.50.
A total of $200,000.00 was transferred into the account on February 10, 2015.
The ending balance of the account as of February 28, 2015, was $224,543.09.
There were service charges totaling $50.00 for the statement period.
The document includes transaction details such as checks paid and outgoing money transfers.
